name: underfeeding
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of a person or animal not getting enough to eat: Bad housing, overcrowding, underfeeding, and low wages can all lead to disease and premature death. Cow/calf pairs should be sorted by nutrient requirements to avoid overfeeding or underfeeding.
More examplesFewer examplesA high mortality from tuberculosis arises from overcrowding, which makes infection easy, and from general bad health due to overwork, underfeeding, and lack of sunlight.At that time, women and children suffered from underfeeding to a much greater extent than men.As for underfeeding, it now appears that overfeeding with formula is much, much more common.
